page.description: Return the extent of the array optional dimension for multidimensional arrays.

argument.name: dimension
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The index of the array dimension.

argument.name: object_address
argument.description: The address of a list or combo box on a form.

page.discussion: The <ARRAY>.SIZE() method returns size of an array.
